itunes:title: Lent Week 5 with Raechel and Amanda
title: Lent Week 5 with Raechel and Amanda
description:
As Raechel and Amanda discuss week 5 of the Lent reading plan, they grow more excited with each day’s reading. The passages found in Ezekiel communicate to God’s people the harsh consequences of their sins. The book of Ezekiel is also a message of God’s enduring love. The thread of hope that runs through the book of Ezekiel is the promise of restoration because of God’s mercy and faithfulness. Join them as they discuss what that hope meant for God’s people then and what it means for His people now.


Read with Us: 

This episode corresponds to Week 5 of the She Reads Truth She Reads Truth Lent 2022: Come to Life reading plan found on the She Reads Truth app and SheReadsTruth.com. 

Shop the She Reads Truth Lent 2022: Come to Life collection at ShopSheReadsTruth.com. 

Show notes can be found at shereadstruth.com/podcast/_______________________
